name: Static Data Server
instructions: MCP Server - Market Static Data Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

get_all_currencies.name: get_all_currencies
get_all_currencies.description: Get a list of the the currencies in which the instrument can be traded

annotations.title: Get all traded currencies as ISO 4217 codes

get_all_industries.name: get_all_industries
get_all_industries.description: Get a list of all industries sectors in the the companies are involved in doing business

get_all_broker_codes.name: get_all_broker_codes
get_all_broker_codes.description: Get a list of all broker codes that are used to classify the instruments

get_all_product_type_codes.name: get_all_product_type_codes
get_all_product_type_codes.description: Get a list of the different product type codes that are used to classify the instruments

get_all_venue_codes.name: get_all_venue_codes
get_all_venue_codes.description: Get a list of the different venue codes where the instruments can be traded

get_venue_description.name: get_venue_description
get_venue_description.description: Get a venue description by passing a venue code

get_broker_name.name: get_broker_name
get_broker_name.description: Get a broker name by passing a broker code

get_product_type_description.name: get_product_type_description
get_product_type_description.description: Get a product description by passing a product type code
